Title: Correction: Meeting abstracts from the 4th International Clinical Trials Methodology Conference (ICTMC) and the 38th Annual Meeting of the Society for Clinical Trials [Bio med center., 18, SUPPL. 1, (2017) (200)] DOI: 10.1186/s13063-017-1902-y
Abstract: © 2018 The Author(s).Correction: After publication of this supplement [1], it was brought to our attention that two authors were missing for abstract P66: Recruitment aids for a phase II randomised trial in low risk bladder cancer. The two missing authors can be found in this Erratum.
